summary: fscrypt: fix keyring memory leak on mount failure
details:
fscrypt: fix keyring memory leak on mount failure

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.154 by commit 29997a6fa60de1de2fa0de471e7652efa6e95868, it was introduced in version v5.10.154 by commit 391cceee6d435e616f68631e68f5b32d480b1e67. For more details please see the references link.
